txt.en: 'Elfmar's father, Elfhelm, left his position as Thane when he was summoned to serve as Marshal of the garrison of Edoras, in succession to the late Marshal Éomund. Of late, Elfhelm embarked from Rohan to assist Prince Théodred and Grimbold of Grimslade, at the Fords of Isen.\n\n'Elfmar's sister, Elflád, is wedded to Reeve Fastred of the Sutcrofts, and dwells with her husband in Snowbourn.'
